I could write another long review here, or I could keep it short. I'll keep it short.

The game's fun, but the amount of toxicity and hackers you get in this game without using third party tools like Faceit/ESEA is insane. 

On that note: cyka blyat
Otimo jogo, porem tem tornado gratuito fez com que aumentasse o numero de hacks
great game, made a whole lot of money with stickers and cases, all of which I used to buy some single player games that I never played
The best team-based realistic FPS out there. Highly competitive. Ultimate twitch FPS.

Very fun game to play. Competitive experience is greatly increased when playing with friends but extremely toxic and non-understanding teams are rarer than you might expect.
